review: I love it! I like how the heart turns red when its full and green when its dead. Its so cute and very good loud sound to me when I connect it to my laptop and gives ultra clear sound and stands up on its own or lay it down to sleep while charging. There is a key holder included. I have to lower it sometimes because im afraid to blow the speakers. lol My friends came over and asked where did you get that? They went and each bought a few from this company as well as I did. :)

review: I got this from Target for $35, but it came with a $10 gift card. I love this little thing. I had some issues setting it up initially, but I think that was my fault. If this happens to you, restart the chromecast and the wifi router. I love that I can cast with my laptop screen shut--no battery use at all. I have nothing negative to say about it, actually--hence the 5 stars :)
